---
title: "Survival_Analysis_Final"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(mosaic)
```


```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
df <- read_csv("HELPdata.csv", na="*")
```

```{r}
df <- df %>%
  mutate(yrs_education = as.numeric(a9), gender=a1, alcq_30 = as.numeric(alcq_30)) %>% 
  select(group, dayslink, linkstatus, yrs_education, gender, age, alcohol, alcq_30)
```

```{r}
summary(df)
```


```{r}
df %>% 
  group_by(group) %>% 
  ggplot() + geom_point(aes(x=dayslink, y=linkstatus, color=group))
```


```{r}
care_fit <- survfit(Surv(dayslink, linkstatus) ~ group, data=df)
ggsurvplot(care_fit, conf.int = T) + 
  ggtitle("Survival Plot for HELP Treatment")
```

```{r}
care_fit <- survfit(Surv(dayslink, linkstatus) ~ gender, data=df)
ggsurvplot(care_fit) + 
  ggtitle("Survival Plot for HELP Treatment")
```

```{r}
care_fit <- survfit(Surv(dayslink, linkstatus) ~ alcohol, data=df)
ggsurvplot(care_fit) + 
  ggtitle("Survival Plot for HELP Treatment")
```
